name: Home4You
description:
Home for you is a game about selling the right houses to the right people! You know what they say, different strokes for different folks, right? Well, this game is about guessing and identifying the things that a person really likes and selling a house according to their tastes! Meet and talk with a strange variety of colourful and quirky people in this small and cute game!

Our team is formed by the following members, from the left to the right:

- Arthur Alves (ClaymoreCCCLX): UI and Design

- Adrián Botana (UnTalPaco): Unity guy and programmer.

- Fanny Besse (fbesse/nihiloex): Narrative and QA Testing

- Juan López (Turcobandido): Character design and UI

- Edouard Lavenue (ecplav): Narrative, sound and QA Testing

 

Music by Tri-Tachyon - https://soundcloud.com/tri-tachyon/albums
